SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SET UP AND MAINTAIN NET ZERO CLOUD
Import Data for CRM Analytics Dashboards

Import data for the CRM Analytics dashboards for Net Zero Cloud to see relevant metrics and insights.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Enterprise, Professional, Unlimited, and Developer Editions where Net Zero Cloud is enabled

To begin, create the required .csv files with precise column names and the specified column order. When the files are ready, use the Net Zero guided setup flow to set up the analytics app. During the guided setup process, you will upload the .csv files, and then the app will add the metrics to relevant dashboards. For more information, see Upload a CSV File to Create a Dataset.

NOTE Use only a UTF-8-compliant text editor to create and open CSV files. Opening CSV files in non-compliant text editors, such as Microsoft Excel, reformats and makes the files unusable in CRM Analytics. To review the file format requirements, such as date formats, see CRM Analytics External Data Format Developer Guide.

Salesforce cancels the data upload if it encounters errors in the .csv file. Failed records, with the reason for failure, are linked to the Received Document record. To troubleshoot upload problems, look at the number of records processed and the error details. After resolving the errors, upload the file again.

CSV File Format for Importing Business Metrics Data
Create a .csv file to import business metrics data into the Emission Forecasts and What-If Analysis dashboard.
CSV File Format for Importing Efficiency Factor Data
Create a .csv file to use to import efficiency factor data into the Emission Forecasts and What-If Analysis dashboard.
CSV File Format for Importing Renewable Energy Data
Create a .csv file to use to import business metrics data into the Emission Forecasts and What-If Analysis dashboard.
CSV File Format for Importing Initiative Savings Data
Create a .csv file to use to import initiative savings data into the Emission Forecasts and What-If Analysis dashboard.
CSV File Format for Importing DEI Data
Import data from an external source to show relevant metrics in the DEI Insights dashboard.
